name: privity
content:
privity noun [U]
(LEGAL RELATIONSHIP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a legally recognized relationship between two people or groups of people: The lawyer argued that there was no privity of contract between the plaintiff and the defendant. The original contracting parties no longer have privity with each other.
More examplesFewer examplesSince we're not a party we have no privity to that agreement.

privity noun [U]
(KNOWLEDGE)
